txt.en: 'I have done what I could, but about half of the keys were broken beyond repair, or were missing their pieces.\n\n'Return with these repaired keys to Candelleth, and give her my regards. Would that I could have repaired them all, but know that I succeeded where most others would fail. It was not an easy assignment.'
'You have returned! Was Merilos able to repair the keys, as I thought she would?'
'Candelleth is still at her Elf-camp in Tâl Bruinen, is she not? Bring to her the keys I have repaired and tell her that it was no easy service, but I performed it gladly.'
'You have not brought me the keys?'
Merilos has repaired as many of the keys as she could, and you should now bring them to Candelleth.
Bring box of repaired keys to Candelleth
Candelleth is at her Elf-camp in Tâl Bruinen.\n\nMerilos has repaired as many of the keys as she was able, and you should bring them now to Candelleth.
